import React from 'react' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import {Modal, Button} from 'bootstrap'; function TaskItem(props) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (
{props.task.title} {props.task.state}

{props.task.body}

Modal heading Woohoo, you're reading this text in a modal!
) } export default TaskItem
